summary: The document is an FBI identification form dated 02/11/98, part of a series related to the JFK assassination system. It details investigations into individuals and activities connected to a planned bombing raid on Cuba in 1963, including communications between FBI offices. The focus is on identifying all participants, the source of funds, arms, and planes intended for the attack, alongside the seizure of explosives. The document underscores the case's significance to the Department.
key_findings: The document is part of the FBI's records related to the JFK assassination system.
It discusses investigations into individuals connected with a planned bombing raid on Cuba in 1963.
There is a focus on identifying participants, sources of funding, arms, and planes for the bombing attack.
The document highlights the seizure of explosives and the importance of the case to the Department.
